dct_title_s: North America from the French of Mr. d'Anville improved with the English surveys made since the peace
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Shows area east of Louisiana. From: The American atlas, or, A geographical description of the whole continent of America ... London : Printed by R. Sayer and Bennett, 1776.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Robt. Sayer & J. Bennett, no. 53 Fleet Street, 10 June 1775.
